thread.title: Director of Healthy Living - Minneapolis - Sports and Fitness
thread.title_full: Director of Healthy Living - Minneapolis - Sports and Fitness

title: Director of Healthy Living - Minneapolis - Sports and Fitness
text: Posted/Updated: 10-15-2015 Brief Job Description: Provides leadership and direction for a variety of branch healthy living programs (i.e. fitness, aquatics, active older adults, chronic diseases, etc.). Promotes, sells and educates staff, members and community participants on the benefits of participating in key healthy living programs to maximize revenue potential and increase member retention.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
